name: node-sassc
description: Sassc compiled with MinGW or native compiler
author: Phil Thompson

scripts.download-libsass: cd ./libsass && git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.download-sassc: cd ./sassc && git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.install-all: bash -c "mkdir sassc/bin && export SASS_LIBSASS_PATH=../libsass && export CC=gcc && cd ./sassc; mingw32-make; cd .."
